function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus in closed office spaces","Impact":"Risk of workers contracting COVID-19 through aerosol viruses in the air","Mitigation":"Implementing engineering controls (e.g., ventilation) and administrative controls to prevent airborne virus transmission","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, and HVAC systems","People":"Workers in closed office spaces","Owner":"Building owners, policymakers, and office managers"},{"Description":"Respiratory spread of the novel coronavirus under low temperature and low relative humidity (RH) conditions","Impact":"Rapid transmission of the novel coronavirus in environments with low RH and temperature","Mitigation":"Maintaining appropriate indoor temperature and humidity levels, and implementing infection protective and preventive strategies","Technologies":"HVAC systems, humidifiers, and temperature control systems","People":"Population in low RH and temperature environments","Owner":"Building owners, policymakers, and office managers"}]}
